com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.container

Class SessionTokenInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.container.InterceptorComponent
      • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.container.SessionTokenInterceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WebComponent, Serializable

    public class SessionTokenInterceptor
extends InterceptorComponent
    This session token interceptor makes sure the request being processed is for the correct session.

    As the token is a UUID, it will be much harder for CSRF attacks. No request processing will occur without the correct UUID.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Jonathan Austin
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
